q: US administration, like France and the European Union, never called for Zine El Abidine Ben Ali to go. Indeed, on January 12- just two days before he fled- State Department spokesperson Philip Crowley said Washington was concerned about actions by the demonstrators, those who do not have peaceful intentions . But soon thereafter, Washington accelerated the denouement of the crisis, Marina Ottaway said. In a statement posted at the center of Chrysler's home page Saturday, Sergio Marchionne said he regrets a term he used and considers it "inappropriate." Yesterday, in responding to a question about Chrysler's government loans, I used a term in reference to the interest rate being charged on our government loans that has raised concern, Sergio Marchionne 's statement said. "I regret the remark, which I consider inappropriate." Sergio Marchionne said Chrysler remains grateful for the bailouts and noted that no other parties were willing to assist in Chrysler's recovery.

We are continuing the search and will find more, Zahi Hawass told Reuters.
